sentence.Network_cn: 很多贫穷国家都在放弃独裁统治。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'autonomy'): from Greek autokrateia, from autokratēs (see autocrat)

entry.def: Autocracy is government or control by one person who has complete power.

example.ex: Many poor countries are abandoning autocracy.
example.tran: 很多贫穷国家都在放弃独裁统治。

entry.def: An autocracy is a country or organization that is ruled by one person who has complete power.

example.ex: She ceded all power to her son-in-law who now runs the country as an autocracy.
example.tran: 她把权力全部交给自己的女婿，他现在对国家实行独裁统治。

means.word_mean: 1. a political system governed by a single individual
2. a political theory favoring unlimited authority by a single individual
